biotools.summary: scikit-activeml is a Python module for active learning on top of SciPy and scikit-learn. The following code implements an Active Learning Cycle with 20 iterations using a Logistic Regression Classifier and Uncertainty Sampling. To use other classifiers, you can simply wrap classifiers from scikit-learn or use classifiers provided by scikit-activeml. Note that the main difficulty using active learning with scikit-learn is the ability to handle unlabeled data which we denote as a specific value (MISSING_LABEL) in the label vector y_true.
